item.description:
Fall and WaterFalls ... a lovely loop around Mt. Greylock State Reserve

PLEASE -- TAKE A FEW MINUTES AND REVIEW ALL THE TRIP DETAILS BELOW, AND ALSO READ OUR GUIDELINES!


EVENT ORGANIZER:
Julie Moran Contact me here: jmmoran @ nycap.rr.com, Mobile 281-5882. Please feel free to email me with your thoughts about this trip.


IMPORTANT UPDATES (08/12/2008 3:30 PM): This trip, also in conjunction with Hiking Mates CHALLENGE and also the Hudson Valley Hikers, includes the relatively moderate route up the Hopper and Money brooks and the Money Brook Falls; to the Appalachian Trail to the summit; then down the Hopper Trail to Sperry Road and the amazing Stony Ledge viewpoint; then finally down the lovely Haley Farm Trail.

BE SURE TO VIEW / PRINT / TAKE WITH YOU THE AREA MAP BELOW.


My dog Bingo, in a beautiful pine forest along the Appalachian Trail at the north end of the Mt. Greylock State Reserve.



CLICK THE LINK: READ MY NARRATIVE, IN STORIES AND PICTURES, OF BINGO AND MY WANDERINGS ACROSS MT. GREYLOCK AND THE BERSHIRES ...


ESSENTIAL TRIP DETAILS:


When / Where: See above.

Difficulty: About 10.1 miles, about 2,441 ASL Total Vertical Climb.

Google Maps -- Estimated Trailhead Directions, Distances (link) from the meetup location to the trailhead at the end of Hopper Road, near South Williamstown, MA.


WEATHER AND OTHER SUDDEN EVENTS CAN CAUSE SUDDEN CHANGES TO OR CANCELLATION OF THIS EVENT. YOU MUST CHECK BACK TO THE MEETUP.COM SITE OFTEN FOR UPDATES TO ANY HIKING MATES CHALLENGE EVENT. YOU MUST READ OUR GROUP GUIDELINES BEFORE ATTENDING ANY HIKING MATES CHALLENGE EVENT.


ESSENTIALS TO BRING: Flash light AND head lamp, food / snacks / at least three bottles of water, first aid items, sun screen, bug spray.


ADDITIONAL POLICIES / REQUIREMENTS / ITEMS: None.


YOUR RESEARCH ESSENTIALS:

Overview of the Area:
http://www.mass.gov/d...
http://www.mountainsu...
http://www.summitpost...
http://www.berkshirew...


My dog Bingo, in the early days, as we climbed up toward Mt. Greylock along the leafy Haley Farm Trail.



NOTE: You are responsible for bringing appropriate gear, supplies, clothing, first aid and lights. You should review topographic maps and trail features carefully; understanding topography of any challenge hike is key to your knowing where you are, where you're going and how to get back.
